mlflex
Class InstanceVault

java.lang.Object
  mlflex.InstanceVault

public class InstanceVault
extends java.lang.Object

This class provides convenience methods for accessing information about data instances that are used for machine-learning analyses.

Author:
Stephen Piccolo

GetAnalysisDataPoints

public java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> GetAnalysisDataPoints(AbstractDataProcessor processor,
                                                                   java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> dataPoints)
                                                            throws java.lang.Exception
This method returns a list of data points that should be used in machine-learning analyses for a given data processor.

Parameters:
processor - Data processor
dataPoints - List of data points (analysis data points that are not in this list will be ignored)
Returns:
List of data points to be used in analyses
Throws:
java.lang.Exception

GetAnalysisInstanceIDs

public java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> GetAnalysisInstanceIDs(AbstractDataProcessor processor,
                                                                    java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> instanceIDs)
                                                             throws java.lang.Exception
This method returns a list of the data instances that should be used in machine-learning analyses for a given data processor.

Parameters:
processor - The data processor
instanceIDs - List of candidate instance IDs (any analysis instance ID that is not in this list will be ignored)
Returns:
List of data instance IDs
Throws:
java.lang.Exception

GetAnalysisInstanceIDs

public java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> GetAnalysisInstanceIDs(AbstractDataProcessor processor,
                                                                    java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> instanceIDs,
                                                                    boolean onlyInstancesWithAllData)
                                                             throws java.lang.Exception
This method returns a list of the data instances that should be used in machine-learning analyses for a given data processor.

Parameters:
processor - The data processor
instanceIDs - List of candidate instance IDs (any analysis instance ID that is not in this list will be ignored)
onlyInstancesWithAllData - Whether to only include data instances that have data for all data processors (when there are multiple processors per data instance)
Returns:
List of data instance IDs
Throws:
java.lang.Exception

GetAnalysisInstanceIDs

public java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> GetAnalysisInstanceIDs(java.util.ArrayList<AbstractDataProcessor> processors)
                                                             throws java.lang.Exception
This method returns a list of the data instances that should be used in machine-learning analyses for various data processors.

Parameters:
processors - The data processors
Returns:
List of data instance IDs
Throws:
java.lang.Exception

GetAnalysisInstances

public DataInstanceCollection GetAnalysisInstances(AbstractDataProcessor processor,
                                                   java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> instanceIDs,
                                                   java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> dataPoints)
                                            throws java.lang.Exception
Retrieves a list of data instances that can be used in machine-learning analyses for a given data processor.

Parameters:
processor - Data processor
instanceIDs - List of data instance IDs (any instance ID not in this list will be ignored)
dataPoints - List of data points (any data point not in this list will be ignored)
Returns:
Collection of data instances that can be used in machine-learning analyses
Throws:
java.lang.Exception

                                      throws java.lang.Exception

processor - Data processor
Returns:
Number of data points that will be used in machine-learning analysese

java.lang.Exception

GetAnalysisInstancesSize

public int GetAnalysisInstancesSize(AbstractDataProcessor processor,
                                    java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> instanceIDs)
                             throws java.lang.Exception
This method indicates how many data instances should be used in machine-learning analyses for a given data processor.

Parameters:
processor - Data processor
instanceIDs - List of instance IDs to consider (any not in this list will be ignored)
Returns:
Number of data instances that will be used in machine-learning analyses

                                      throws java.lang.Exception
